bug.description: Serving GUI on <denchmark-link:http://0.0.0.0:47334/static/index.html>http://0.0.0.0:47334/static/index.html</denchmark-link> doesnâ€™t work on Windows. Maybe serve the GUI default on loopback address 127.0.0.1 or localhost.

comments.comment: This has already been implemented. I use mindsdb as well on Windows and I have access to the GUI via "localhost" or the IP 127.0.0.1.

Default config in last MindsDB version already '127.0.01'. We should not use '0.0.0.0' anywhere, because in this case behavior is unpredictable: <denchmark-link:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/0.0.0.0>https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/0.0.0.0</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ZoranPandovski>@ZoranPandovski</denchmark-link> Looks like access by 'localhost' and '127.0.0.1' have not any problem at this moment, so i close this issue.
